title: Pulsing Button with Glow Effect
description: Create a button that continuously pulses with a glowing effect.
instructions: Build a circular button that continuously scales between 1.0 and 1.15 with an elastic curve. Add a glow effect (BoxShadow) that intensifies as the button grows. The animation should loop forever using repeat(reverse: true).

hints.text: Use SingleTickerProviderStateMixin and create the controller with vsync: this
Call _controller.repeat(reverse: true) to create a ping-pong loop
Use _controller.value (0.0 to 1.0) to interpolate the glow intensity

commonMistakes.consequence: Memory leak - the animation controller keeps running
commonMistakes.correction: Always dispose controllers in the dispose() method

commonMistakes.mistake: Creating new Animation objects in build()
commonMistakes.correction: Create Animation objects once in initState()
